1.content:
Finally after a long and treacherous walk you arrive at a tall stone towers... A sign hangs above the wooden door that reads, The Tower of Tickles. Cautiously you enter the tower to see a candle lit hallway with four doors, two on each side of the room that must lead to a separate room and a staircase going up.

A small sign hangs on the front of each door with an image on it.

The first door has an image of a yellow fox, Renamon.

The second door has an image of a blue fox, Krystal.

The third door has an image of a gray rabbit, Bugs Bunny.

The fourth door has an image of a fox, Fox McCloud.

Do you choose to enter one of the four doors or do you go up to the next floor?
1.title: The Entrance Hall

14.content:
You fallow the sign's instructions, leading to a large room that contained Fox, leeping on a table with his arms and legs stuck to it by metal clamps. His clothes where all on, along with sodium lamps to keep primarily his footpaws hot, keeping them sensitive and sweaty, along with a portion of the rest of his body.

His sleep gives you time to decide where your first site to tickle will be, and gather the required tools as well. But, first thing's first, where will you tickle Fox first?
14.title: Fourth Door, Fox McCloud

144.content:
You decide his feet first, having a bit of a foot fetish and/or always wanting to touch and tickle the strong space fox's delicate paws.

Now to set up the net part of the plan... Tools! which tool or tools?
144.title: feet/paws/footpaws

choices: A lot! Give him a foot rub with this stuff!
This room is big enough... dump the whole thing on his paws!!
1441.content:
As you walk into the room, you notice a few things...
Fox is sleeping in what looks like a comfortable bed, but also restrained. He has on grey socks, looking very damp with sweat due to the two heating lamps.
These lamps are set on a system similar to cameras in a movie set, in that they can be shifted around any direction for adjustment.
Lastly, the Paw Grower creme you requested sat on a table by his paws.

You read the instructions on the 1/2 gallon container, which reads "...Use sparingly on the footpaws. One dab = 1 size"
Now to decide... are we going to grow the space fox's paws a little bit, or a lot?
1441.title: Paw Grower(tm) cream

15.content:
Looking around this floor you notice that these creatures are more generic rather than an actual character.

There where four doors on this floor as well:

The first showed a wolf
The second showed a cat
The third showed a mouse
The final one showed a bird

Do any of these appeal or would you like to try a different floor?
15.title: To the next floor

153.content:
Name: Timmothy Kirkman


Gender: Male


Age: 20


Appearance: Tim stands in at around three inches tall, has a short mouse tail, and has light gray colored fur all over his body, except for the insides his ears, and where his pads are under his feet. He has big oval shaped ears on either side of his head, his hair looks like a hand that's covering some of his left eye, his eyes are pure black, and he has whiskers on either side of his face as well. He normally wears a red and white striped short sleeved shirt with the stripes going left and right, normal jean type jeans, and he walks around barefoot.


Personality: Tim's personality is easily summed up with the following words. Childlike. Carefree. Friendly. Outgoing. Pretty much anyone would enjoy hanging out with him.


Other info: Tim is bisexual, he prefers to tickle rather than be tickled, and he is ticklish everywhere, but unless you're small like he is, you'll have a very hard time tickling him.
153.title: Timmothy Kirkman

info.brief_description: A place where you may tickle other furs of any gender. All are welcome!
info.description:
Hello, and welcome to The Tickle Tower... a place where you may come and play. And by play, I mean tickle torture other furs, famous or not famous. You will start your journey on the first floor of a tall tower... each floor leads to four different rooms and a staircase at the end of the hall that leads to the next floor.

Take your time and enjoy your stay here! At, The Tower of Tickles!

Feel free to add any furry character that you want, famous or not. I may add a few of my own characters to the story. Feel free to add or create your own characters to add to the story.

Anything goes in the tower, so long as it pertains to tickling.
